results.name: The difference between the number of partitions of n into odd parts (A000009) and the number of partitions of n into even parts (A035363).
link: Robert G. Wilson v and Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000 (terms n=1..165 from Robert G. Wilson v)
maple: b:= proc(n, t) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, add(add(`if`(
mathematica: f[n_] := Length[ IntegerPartitions[n, All, 2Range[n] -1]] - Length[ IntegerPartitions[n, All, 2 Range[n]]]; Array[f, 60]
